attributes.action: Standardise Energy Company Customer Service to an acceptable level.
attributes.additional_details: Poor CS is easily proven by simply logging onto any of their social media sites and reading the customer posts. 99% of responses from customers have nothing to do with the provider's story or post and is purely criticism about how they have been treated. I have proposed a framework of customer service streams and to what standard each one should perform. This petition page is very restricted and I am unable to put forward my proposals in such a poorly designed form. I will provide separately.
attributes.background: It is very apparent now that many Energy Companies are very poor at providing customer service and we have all had bad experiences. It is at a level where it is difficult to conceive how CS could be so bad and therefore must be designed that way. It is now time to force a standard of CS.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We can't accept further submissions on petitions beyond the space provided. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining more clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
